content: -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **i heart rainbows hat** - by tin can knits ================ -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- ***babies should be dressed in garments so sweet that they hurt your teeth just to look at this joyfully saccharine little hat tastes of sweet tarts rocket pops and edible candy necklaces ok i admit it i watched the care bears as a child over and over and over again *** **like our designs ** get our email updates 1 so you don t miss our irresistible new patterns fabulous tutorials and subscriber-only special offers ---------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------- **pattern info** =========== **sizing** baby toddler child adult to fit head circumference 13-14 15-16 17-18 20-21 **yarn** sock / fingering weight yarn main colour 90 100 120 150 yds contrast colours 1-6 10 15 20 25 yds each * samples shown in sweetgeorgia superwash sock in riptide sweetgeorgia cashluxe sock in saffron and koigu kppm in colours 1175 2220 1521 1050 1051 * **gauge** 28 sts per 4 inches in stockinette on larger needles **needles** us #2 / 2 75 16 circular and us #3 / 3 25mm 16 circular and dpn s **notions** darning needle **helpful tutorials** hat knitting tutorial 2 ---------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------- for all pattern abbreviations techniques and to contact us visit www tincanknits com 3 ---------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------- 1 http //eepurl com/k5p8l 2 http //blog tincanknits com/2013/08/17/lets-knit-a-hat/ 3 http //tincanknits com/
